text:
So you know how sports teams have promotions like “Bobblehead Day”?

Why can’t there be “#COVID19 #vaccine Day”?

It’s a win-win. Sports fans can go back to the stadium &see a game & people are getting vaccinated.

Hey #JoeBiden you should hire me!

#MLB #NHL #NBA #NFL #COLvsVGK https://t.co/VefVerZmVg
